identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Studio Minimalist' aesthetic that feels like a high-end media kit, not a generic dating app.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Tinder' mechanics with 'Editorial' aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every screen should feel like a 'Broadcast Signal' - clear, amplified, direct.
Content is King: The 'Talent' (Guest) and the 'Show' (Podcast) are the heroes. UI recedes.
Zoom In: Use massive typography and edge-to-edge imagery.
Negative Space: White space is luxury. Don't crowd the signal.

accent_primary.name: On-Air Orange
accent_primary.usage: Call to Actions, 'Match' Highlights, Notification Dots

scale.caption: text-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-zinc-400 font-body

buttons.primary: bg-zinc-950 text-white hover:bg-zinc-800 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-zinc-950 border-2 border-zinc-100 hover:border-zinc-950 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold transition-all

cards.swipe_card: relative w-full aspect-[3/4] bg-white rounded-3xl shadow-xl overflow-hidden border border-zinc-100 select-none touch-none
cards.profile_card: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-zinc-100 p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.feature_card: bg-zinc-50 rounded-2xl p-8 border border-zinc-100 hover:border-orange-200 transition-colors group

inputs.default: h-14 px-6 rounded-xl bg-zinc-50 border-zinc-200 focus:border-zinc-950 focus:ring-0 transition-all text-lg placeholder:text-zinc-400

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-6 left-4 right-4 h-20 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-2xl rounded-full flex items-center justify-around z-50

swipe_deck.structure: flex flex-col items-center justify-center h-[80vh] w-full max-w-md mx-auto relative
swipe_deck.animation: use framer-motion for drag gestures (drag='x', dragConstraints, dragElastic)

chat_interface.bubble_me: bg-zinc-950 text-white rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm p-4 max-w-[80%] self-end
chat_interface.bubble_them: bg-zinc-100 text-zinc-900 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm p-4 max-w-[80%] self-start

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Mic', 'Headphones', 'Radio', 'Signal' for brand elements.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid, rich colors or subtle noise textures.
Do NOT center text by default. Left-align for readability, center only for 'Hero' moments.
Ensure all touch targets are at least 44px.
For the Swipe Deck: Use 'framer-motion' AnimatePresence and drag gestures. Do not build from scratch without a library.
For Chat: Ensure the input area is fixed to the bottom and the message list scrolls.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the 'Broadcast Signal' color palette and fonts.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the 'SwipeCard' component first - it is the core interaction.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'RoleSelection' screen with high-impact imagery (Host vs Guest).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Implement the 'Chat' interface with a focus on clean typography.
